QuestData.Title: The Reliquary
QuestData.Description: We have a contingent of the Reliquary in the chamber just to the northeast inside the temple.$B$BThey've been making increasing noises about something that the Twilight's Hammer is up to.$B$B$n, would you be a dear and see what they need?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Examiner Rowe at the Temple of Earth in Deepholm.
